amendment.description: To enhance the defense contracting opportunities for persons with disabilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 795 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 795 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S6835; text: CR S6835) To enhance the defense contracting opportunities for persons with disabilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 795 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Roberts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 795 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
